channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
i need help
Q9: When I try to log into MoparScape, it says "Error connecting to server, hit cancel and start server"? A9: This simply means that the server that you are trying to connect to is down. Try going to the Server Status List and getting a different server ip. So don't worry. Just keep trying and you will get on one of them eventually.
the server status list isnt working
ive tryed heaps of servers but non of them are working... and i just downloaded moparscape, is their anything else i need to download before playing? i have java. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 05:11:43 AM[/size][hr]ive tried my own server, some other servers, and the first server that is their please help i need help bad, just any ideas that might work please i beg you. ive spent about 4 hours trying to work it out, i atlest want to have 1 go on this pleaase

item.title: Help please

item.description:

i need help

Q9: When I try to log into MoparScape, it says “Error connecting to server, hit cancel and start server”?
A9: This simply means that the server that you are trying to connect to is down. Try going to the Server Status List and getting a different server ip. So don’t worry. Just keep trying and you will get on one of them eventually.
